column1: This product is amazing! I've never had such clear skin.
I was really disappointed with this product. It didn't work at all and I had to return it.
I've been using this product for a few weeks now and it's been great. My skin looks so much better.
This product was just okay. It didn't blow me away, but it wasn't terrible either.
I don't know what everyone else is talking about. This product worked great for me. I would definitely recommend it.
I have really sensitive skin and was worried this product would irritate it, but it's been great so far.
I had high hopes for this product, but unfortunately it didn't live up to my expectations.
I would give this product a solid 3. It's nothing special, but it gets the job done.
Absolutely love this product! Can't believe how much it helped my skin.
